import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import Progressbar from "./Progressbar" import { useState } from "react" import { useEffect } from "react" import cancel from "./images/cancel.svg" const Alphabetslec = () => { const[completed, setCompleted]= useState(0); useEffect(() => { setInterval(() => setCompleted(Math.floor(Math.random() * 100) + 1), 2000); }, []); return (

There are twenty five (25) alphabets in Yoruba language. These are:

A B D E Ẹ F G GB H I J K L
M N O Ọ P R S Ṣ T U W Y
) } export default Alphabetslec
